comments: Previous name was: Once started, this mixes the natural numbers and the natural numbers shifted by 1.Smallest number of integer sided squares needed to tile a 2 X n rectangle. a(5) = 4:._._._._._.|   |   |_||___|___|_|. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 12 2013

formula: a(n) = 3/4 -(-1)^n*3/4 +n/2.G.f.: (2*x-x^2)/((1-x)*(1-x^2)).a(2n) = n, a(2n+1) = n+2.a(n+2) = a(n)+1.a(n) = -a(-3-n).a(n) = A110570(n,2) for n>1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 28 2005a(n) = (n+1)-a(n-1) with n>0, a(0)=0. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 18 2010a(n) = sum(k=1..n, (-1)^(n+k)*(k+1)). - _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Nov 23 2012a(n+1) = (a(0) + a(1) + ... + a(n))/a(n) for n>0. This formula with different initial conditions produces A008619. - _Ivan Neretin_, Apr 25 2016E.g.f.: (x*exp(x) + 3*sinh(x))/2. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 25 2016
